mapper.select: select userId from user where userAccount=#{userAccount} and userPassword={userPassword}
select * from fieldManager where fieldManagerId in (select isFieldManager from user where userAccount = #{userAccount})
mapper.insert: insert into fieldManager (fieldManagerId, name, telephoneNumber) value (#{fieldManagerId},#{name},#{telephoneNumber})
mapper.update: update fieldManager set name=#{name},telephoneNumber=#{telephoneNumber} where fieldManagerId in (select isFieldManager from user where userAccount=#{userAccount} and userPassword=#{userPassword})
update user set isFieldManager=-1 where userAccount=#{userAccount} and userPassword=#{userPassword}
